title: Price index : Laptop computers in Canada 2018
summary: This graph represents the Price index of Laptop computers in Canada 2018 .
The number of computers experiences a sharp increase from January until reaching the maximum during June , whereas a small decline is observed in the Month of April .
From June and September the Price index and Laptop computers in July .
gold: This graph represents the price index of laptop computers in Canada in 2018 . The peak value can be observed during January at 966 . During the following months the price index fluctuates , until there is a sharp decline from May to June , reaching the lowest value of 952 .
